unnormalised: Hey guys, return policies are so crucial, right? Especially now with all the online shopping! Once I ordered a kurta for Diwali and the color was totally off. Luckily, the return was smooth. Remember Ramesh's struggle with that broken phone from Flipkart last year? He had to fight tooth and nail! I wish all retailers could adopt a no-hassle policy like that saree shop near Chandni Chowk. Makes life much easier, especially during festival shopping frenzies. Even returns after enjoying a plate of hot biryani shouldn't be a problem!
